reviewText: This is not such a bad dvd, except (1) it's not done in English. (2) not enough world tournament coverage.., i.e -- world cup games highlighting these talents. (3) most of the coverage of these players are about their club affiliations in major Italian soccer leagues..., which is alright, kinda ---- except why just all about the Italian clubs ?!  Overall, it was just too limited and concentrated on too much of a particular level of soccer, and not more or enough depth with even other and more Brazilian players. It was good to see mention of Batistuta, though none of Bebeto.  So..., you be the judge...!!
